title: Custom GF Logo
content:
I am not sure who's logo this is, but I am looking for a similar face. It's defintely custom to an extent. Eurostile is so far the closest I could find, but looking for more.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [gf.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321005140/http:/typophile.com/files/gf.jpg) | 8.07 KB |
author: Shu

comments.content: t26 "megahertz in italic" is pretty close.
I bet that was hand drawn from the get go. The two characters don't have much of a relationship to one another. The extended G and narrow F
An slanted [Xenotron](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321005140/http:/www.dafont.com/en/font.php?file=xenotron&nb_ppp=50) will get you very close.
